item.title: General Motors to stop funding its Cruise robotaxi business
item.description: The automaker said it would combine Cruise’s and GM’s technical teams.

item.title: DreamWorks founder Jeffrey Katzenberg says top Hollywood writers and showrunners are welcoming AI as ‘amazing,’ ‘inspiring,’ tools
item.description: "It's not constraining them, it’s inspiring them,” the studio head-turned-AI investor told Fortune Brainstorm AI.

item.title: Motorola Solutions CTO says AI-powered ‘smart’ surveillance cameras will make the world safer
item.description: Scaling an AI project from a small test to a widely deployed service is a major undertaking requiring organizations to weigh costs and accuracy risks ...

item.title: Fortune Brainstorm AI showed cautious optimism, but companies are growing skeptical about hyped-up promises
item.description: Companies using AI are moving beyond FOMO to ROI—and other lessons from Fortune Brainstorm AI.

item.title: Accused UnitedHealthcare CEO murderer Luigi Mangione refused extradition to New York, court spokesperson confirms
item.description: He was arrested yesterday in Altoona, Pa., ending a weeklong manhunt across the Northeast.
